/* selectEndIpList */
SELECT A.END_IP_ID , A.PROJ_END_ID , A.END_IP_NM , A.END_IP_NO , DATE_FORMAT(A.END_IP_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_IP_DT , A.END_IP_GB , A.END_IP_DOMESTIC_GB , A.CREATE_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DTTM FROM PTL_END_FOLLOW_IP A, (SELECT @rownum:= #{rownum, jdbcType=INTEGER}) R WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROJ_END_ID = #{proj_end_id} ORDER BY A.END_IP_NM DESC

/* selectEndIpDtl */ SELECT END_IP_ID , PROJ_END_ID , END_IP_NM , END_IP_NO , DATE_FORMAT(END_IP_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_IP_DT , END_IP_GB , END_IP_DOMESTIC_GB , DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_ID,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_ID , CREATE_DTTM , DATE_FORMAT(MODIFY_ID,'%Y-%m-%d') AS MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DTTM FROM PTL_END_FOLLOW_IP WHERE 1=1 AND END_IP_ID = #{end_ip_id}
